Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model.buildbehaviours

Interface BuildBehavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnyDomeBuild, BeneathBuild, BuildDecorator, DoubleNoPerimeterBuild, DoubleNotSameBuild, DoubleSameBuild, StandardBuild
    public interface BuildBehavior
    Contains the strategies for finding the buildable squares and for moving the builder. Created using the decorator pattern. StandardBuild is the standard build behavior, custom build behaviors could decorate the Build Behavior

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • build

        boolean build​(Square dest)
        Parameters:
        dest - is the square the player wants to build on
        Returns:
        true if the player can build an additional time

      • neighborhood

        java.util.Set<Square> neighborhood​(Square src)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the set of squares where the builder can build
